post.body_html: Society trying to kill off boys and men.
post.title: What happened to men

body:
I don’t know. We don’t seem able to find some sort of middle ground between being giant pussies and being abhorrent and abusive to women. 

We’re stuck between a gender studies degree and a felony. We either hate masculinity or we take it to mean nothing deeper than dominance and violence towards others, just like the media tells us. 

The only common thread between the two is that neither of them have male social groups to relentlessly mock them for going off the rails. Neither of them can handle criticism without breaking down. The soyboys shriek on Twitter, the macho idiots throw down and kill each other. 

I don’t know what happened to us.

The only common thread between the two is that neither of them have male social groups to relentlessly mock them for going off the rails. Neither of them can handle criticism without breaking down. The soyboys shriek on Twitter, the macho idiots throw down and kill each other.

I don’t know what happened to us.

body:
Commie teachers who put down men and masculinity from childhood. Then toxic masculinity became a major lefty talking point and now we've moved on to hating all white men and the "patriarchy". Being a traditionally masculine man has been so looked down upon men don't want to even try.

  And women worsen that situation by being against tradition by being once again brainwashed by commie teachers and marxist popular culture. Feminism and the rejection of traditional society has obviously been very detrimental to society as a whole. Men need to start acting like men and the same for women. We desperately need women back in the home to raise children because working and single moms have raised these weak petulant people. 

And yeah I think they are trying to kill off masculinity so there no one to fight against the powers that be.

parent.body:
I don’t know. We don’t seem able to find some sort of middle ground between being giant pussies and being abhorrent and abusive to women. 

We’re stuck between a gender studies degree and a felony. We either hate masculinity or we take it to mean nothing deeper than dominance and violence towards others, just like the media tells us. 

The only common thread between the two is that neither of them have male social groups to relentlessly mock them for going off the rails. Neither of them can handle criticism without breaking down. The soyboys shriek on Twitter, the macho idiots throw down and kill each other. 

I don’t know what happened to us.

parent.body:
Commie teachers who put down men and masculinity from childhood. Then toxic masculinity became a major lefty talking point and now we've moved on to hating all white men and the "patriarchy". Being a traditionally masculine man has been so looked down upon men don't want to even try.

  And women worsen that situation by being against tradition by being once again brainwashed by commie teachers and marxist popular culture. Feminism and the rejection of traditional society has obviously been very detrimental to society as a whole. Men need to start acting like men and the same for women. We desperately need women back in the home to raise children because working and single moms have raised these weak petulant people. 

And yeah I think they are trying to kill off masculinity so there no one to fight against the powers that be.

We desperately need women back in the home to raise children because working and single moms have raised these weak petulant people.

And yeah I think they are trying to kill off masculinity so there no one to fight against the powers that be.

post.body: Society trying to kill off boys and men.
post.body_html: Society trying to kill off boys and men.
post.title: What happened to men
